title: Create stacking features with stable bnb reward claim and lock it for min 1 month
body:
This is one problem with moonrat from beginning that why whales out from moonrat. Unstable bnb reward. So i think dev must create a stacking feature with certain time and fair bnb reward. So there is the proposal. If top holders not claim bnb rewards so bnb reward not drain fast.

Proposal : Create stacking feature with stable bnb reward claim. 
1. 10T holders lock for 1 month to get 1% bnb reward shares
2. 20T holders lock for 2 month to get 2% bnb reward shares 
3. 30T holders lock for 3 month to get 3% bnb reward shares


Pros : Price will more stable cuz top whales not sell. Bnb reward will stable too so pool bnb will more higher cuz top holders not claim

Cons : vote no 

*note : this feature work same with delegated pool. Create tier with 30T is top tier and delegated for bottom tier. both tier will get fair bnb reward base on how much they hold ÷ bnb pool share0 (like 80% of bnb pool). If you dont know what is delegated pool you must read from moonrat medium hackathon.

let discuss this and create our passive income more stable in the future.
